lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hm... My food budget is really diving into the red zone again. I better find a new case soon.
*knock knock*

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Perfect timing!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hello! Welcome! Come on in to the Enloade Detective Agency!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How may I help you on this lovely day?

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Enloade? This isn't Keyna from Open and Shut Case Investigations? Well, I guess you'll have to do.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: I go by Earl Leebird, but you can call me Earl. I need you to help me find something very important!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...I'm going to pretend you didn't just mention the name of my arch nemesis and get now to business.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What are you looking for sir?

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: WELL. I was heading home from ordinary day of work, stopping by my usual favorite bakery for a chocolate cake.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: But then, what do you know? Right when I was heading out, some delinquent crow attacked me!

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: When the feathers cleared, my precious ring was gone!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And the cake? What happened to the cake?!

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: Oh the cake was safe. And I ate it of course.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Then what do you want me to find?

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: Clearly I want you to find my ring! My word, are you really a detective?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (God, all this blabbering about cake is making my poor stomach wail. When's the last time I even had cake? And he said it was chocolate-

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: THE RING!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I heard you the first time!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Are you sure the ring didn't just... end up in the same place as your scrumptious cake?

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: In my stomach? Oh heavens no! I told you, it was stolen by a crow!

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: Besides, what kind of hooligan would eat cake with their bare hands?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (A hooligan? Excuse you, eating with your hands obviously saves on dish-washing!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I see. Well, I do know some local crows with reputations, but tracking down one small ring will be a difficult task.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Would you mind giving me more details on this ring?

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: It's an 18k Puccellati ring, worth about $5000- Hm? What's wrong, you just dropped your pen.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Holy smokes! I could buy 2000 hamburgers with that kind of money! That'll last me an entire year- no, TWO years!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Oh don't mind me, I was just doing some wrist exercises. Carry on, sir.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: I-I know, the price is nothing to brag about, but it's a very important ring, yes! I hope you can recover it by the end of this month.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: You will be paid a sumptous reward if you do!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'll find it within a week! I'll search high and low if I have to!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Now, if you would leave right about now, I'll get started immediately.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: Oh thank you so much! I look forward to hearing good things, Detective.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Now what did they call that crow again, the Cheepskate? I'm sure I can track him down if I think hard enough...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, commencing WONDER ZONE: FULL DRIVE. START!
